column5: Hooked up yesterday with OFC member (gone fishing) Scott. Hit the lake at sunrise. Fish were active and slamming senkos and spinner baits. Here is Scott with a decent largie. He caught this one with those garlic scented senkos, man those things stink.    Throwing a spinner bait I nailed a nice size pickeral. Went to reach for the camera and she squirmed out of my hand, boucned off the boat and into the water.  Morning bite was hot but slowed down as the day went on, however we were still catching fish. Surprisingly , small spinner baits were working good in the bright sun. We would burn them by thicker weed egdes and the bass would come out and slam em. Sometimes they would miss it, but throwing back a senko , sometimes we were able to nail em.      We ended up catching alot of smaller bass in the 1 to 2lbs range. Overall it was a great day.  Scott had to get to work so I dropped him off at the marina. I went back out to catch a few more fish. Tried working some lily pads...nothing. Hit a spot with some grass and nailed another bass.  Then off to a spot with some wood along the shore. Had a bass boil up on my spinner bait but missed it.  Threw in my senko...tick, tick...set the hook and missed it again. Threw back the senko again, this time twitching it hard and the fish explodes on it....

twas a great morning... probably got between 35 and 40 bass between us.. a lot were small, but still fun pulling them out of the thick stuff!  It was nice meeting you Jeff, and i can't wait to do it again sometime!
looks like you guys had a good time, nice report Jeff.
Gotta like lots of action, WTG...
Great report and pics cpguy29  Looks like you guys had a fun time out there! Good job Thanks for sharing Leechman
Man, that looks like surface bait heaven! Glad you both had a good time and thanks for the report.
Great Report. Thats the 3 pickerel you fumbled into the water.LOL And I agree. You should try some top water one of these days. Thanks for sharing and good to see you getting out with board members!
Looks like a great day to be out on the water.  Some real nice buckets there.  Thanks for posting.
